tool_description: Find the Email Id of Github Developers using their usernames
name: Github-Email-Finder
title: Github-Email-Finder

api_list.name: Get Email Id of Developers
api_list.description: This API will return the Email ID of the Developers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://github-email-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-email-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://github-email-finder1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-email-finder1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
